## Meeting.sendReaction() method

Send a reaction inside the meeting.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendReaction(reactionType: ReactionServerType, skinToneType?: SkinToneType): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  reactionType | ReactionServerType | type of reaction to be sent. Example: "thumbs\_up" |
|  skinToneType | SkinToneType | _(Optional)_ skin tone for the reaction. Example: "medium\_dark" |

**Returns:**

any
